name: How to Swim!
description:
How to Swim! Disclaimer

If you are looking for a chilled gaming experience, you might consider skipping this game.  It is very likely that you won't make it through the game, because it's too hard. This is intentional. 

We are not liable for any broken gaming hardware and such.

Description

Test your swimming skills with this ragdoll physics game by controlling only your arms.  Can you make it all the way down to the treasure?

This game is inspired by the great Bennett Foddy who created games such as 'QWOP' and 'Getting Over It'.  Therefore this game falls in the category "Rage Game" and it's not for the entertainment of everyone. 

Git Gud or Die Trying.

Controller support.
If the music and sound effects don't load, please reload the page.
You get the best experience when you download the game.

Ludum Dare 48

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 48 with the theme "Deeper and deeper" and was created from scratch within 72 hours.

If you participated in the Ludum Dare yourself, please consider rating our game over there. We really appreciate it. If you leave a comment, we will return the favour and play your game too.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/how-to-swim

How to Play
  • Use F and J to control the shoulders
  • Use D and K to control the elbows
  • Remember how to swim
Team
  • Sebastian Uitz (https://firetotemgames.com/) - Game Design, Programming, Art
  • Michael Steinkellner (https://www.merlinnsound.com/) - Music and Sound Effects
Changes
  • v1.0 - 26.04.2021 - First Version
